column10: I use this crosswalk 6 days a week.  The same behavior happens 40% of the time.  Dangerous Intersection!  The police have been contacted serval times about this but have been unresponsive.

Many families cross Gallows Road at the Madrillon Road intersection.  We have been almost hit multiple times as fast and impatient drivers are frequent. I requested a walkway or a stoplight from VDOT but was refused. As this area gets more congested with new developments, something MUST be done. It's also very hard to turn left onto Gallows coming from Madrillon Road.
